sentences.english: Our Party warned time and again that leading cadres should follow the mass lines.

sentences.english: The people's government must conduct all its activities along the revolutionary mass line.

sentences.english: Adhering to the Mass Line is the only way to implement Anthropocentrism thoroughly .

sentences.english: The only correct way is to follow the mass line.

sentences.english: Zhang Wentain's thinking on the masses route is extremely rich.

sentences.english: The congress urged all the comrades to carry out the mass line.

sentences.english: Taking the mass line decides by the nature and the task of our party.

sentences.english: The mass line must be adhered to.
sentences.chinese: 一定要坚持走群众路线。
